The Features screenshot looks fine... same as mine for 0.5.0.
Have you been able to bring up the VE with any other classes? Or is this 
problem just with creating a class that extends Frame?
Is the project a Java Project? If not, you may be getting the NPE you posted 
here.
Please post this question on the Eclipse news group eclipse.tools.ve 
  (server = news.eclipse.org). 
This is where others may have experienced similar situations and can respond 
with more information. 
Thank you... Peter Walker
